analysis.description:
wallcoinToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/39/0x0d7b7b690d74253ffd9795409a6c603b912ae534.sol#104-105) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0x0d7b7b690d74253ffd9795409a6c603b912ae534.sol#204-214)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0x0d7b7b690d74253ffd9795409a6c603b912ae534.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/39/0x0d7b7b690d74253ffd9795409a6c603b912ae534.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0x0d7b7b690d74253ffd9795409a6c603b912ae534.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
